content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse the website https://www.reuters.com/ to find an article on the use of Pegasus spyware in Mexico. My computer found the website, but the answer gathered from the website was that it did not provide information on the use of Pegasus spyware in Mexico. You then commanded my computer to perform a Google search for "Pegasus spyware Mexico." My computer found multiple articles, including ones from Reuters, the New York Times, and the Guardian, covering the use of Pegasus spyware in Mexico. You then commanded me to browse the website https://www.reuters.com/ again to find an article on the use of Pegasus spyware in Mexico, but the website did not mention anything about finding an article on this topic.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "https://www.nytimes.com/2023/04/18/world/americas/pegasus-spyware-mexico.html"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command read_file returned: Error: /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/https:/www.nytimes.com/2023/04/18/world/americas/pegasus-spyware-mexico.html not found!'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.nytimes.com/", "question": "Can you find an article on the use of Pegasus spyware in Mexico?"}}}'}]
"""
